EmailTemplate.description: Use as a follow-up with a prospect who indicated they'd be interested in switching fleet card programs, and to schedule a meeting.
EmailTemplate.name: Ready to switch to 7-Eleven Fleet?
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for your interest in the 7-Eleven Fleet Card.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
I'm following up in regard to 7-Eleven's Universal Fleet Card Program. I'm open to discussing/negotiating the details according to your needs, and to win your fleet fueling business.
With 7-Eleven, you'll receive (among many benefits):
- 7 cents off every gallon purchased at 7-Eleven for your first 11 weeks; then up to 5 cents off per gallon thereafter. - No set-up or monthly card fees. - Acceptance at more than 90% of U.S. fueling locations. - Exceptional online cost and vehicle management controls, including driver purchasing policies to control who makes purchases, where, for what and for how much. - Detailed purchase and vehicle performance data. - Comprehensive reporting.
Please let me know if you have 10-15 minutes this or next week to discuss things further. I think you'll find 7-Eleven's program a valuable asset to your business.
Thank you in advance for your time.
Tracy Suh Regional Sales Manager 7-Eleven/WEX Inc. P.O. Box 802794, Dallas, TX 75380 Office (972) 803-4181 Cell (469) 571-5873 Fax (207) 761-3536
tracy.suh@wexinc.com www.wexinc.com
